name: Star Spin [RHYTHM JAM VERSION]
description:
-- STAR SPIN --

Star Spin is a fun rhythm game with lots of gorgeous levels of varying difficulty with badass songs from Camellia! Try to reach your highest score in all levels and have fun!

-- HOW TO PLAY --

Each note ring needs to enter its note button to be hit perfectly, time well with the visuals and the music and you'll keep doing perfect scores!

Note rings have different shapes and each one of them needs to be hit specifically:

A circle needs to be hit with the Left Mouse Button (or Z)

A square needs to be hit with the Right Mouse Button (or X)

The star needs to be hit with both the Left Mouse Button and Right Mouse Button (or Z and X)

ATTENTION: PRESS P TO PAUSE WHILE IN A LEVEL

The game has drawing tablets and virtual pen support! Be sure to try it if you got one!

-- RHYTHM JAM SUBMISSION --

This game is a submission to the Rhythm Jam, made in a time period of a week between July 23rd to July 31st.

Programming, Art, Game Design, SFX and VFX were all made by me (KaitoMajima). Credits to Camellia for the music provided by his DMCA free playlist.

Music:
Crystallized
Hello to the your first game
Looking for Edge of Ground
Exit This Earth's Atomosphere

Some assets were used in the production of this game, which are:
Koreographer and FEEL.

-- ATTENTION --

I had to withdraw the WebGL version due to its insane bugs and problems, please try the downloadable version instead, thanks!

-- WARNING --

This game may have flashing lights included. Discretion is advised.
